definition.name: Downgrade Julia compat entries
definition.description: Uses Resolver.jl to find and install minimal compatible versions of dependencies.

inputs.name: skip
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of packages to not downgrade.

inputs.name: projects
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of Julia projects to resolve.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: Downgrade mode: deps (direct dependencies), alldeps (deps + weakdeps), weakdeps (only weakdeps), forcedeps (deps with strict lower bound verification)

inputs.name: julia_version
inputs.description: Julia version to use with resolver (default: 1.10)

steps.run: julia --color=yes "${{ github.action_path }}/downgrade.jl" "${{ inputs.skip }}" "${{ inputs.projects }}" "${{ inputs.mode }}" "${{ inputs.julia_version }}"

evidence.reasoning: The action is focused on finding and installing minimal compatible versions of dependencies, which directly relates to managing dependencies in a project.
